org.atmosphere.wasync
Interface Function<T>

Type Parameters:
T - 
public interface Function<T>

A function is asynchronously invoked when a response is received, complete or not. This library supports predefined life cycle's events (@link #MESSAGE} that can be used. For example, a Function can be defined for handling IOException:

class Function() { public void on(IOEXception ex) { } }
This function can be registered using the Socket.on(Function) as
socket.on(new Function() { .... }
This is the equivalent of doing
socket.on(MESSAGE.error, new Function() { .... }
Anonymous functions call also be invoked if a Decoder match its type
socket .decoder(new Decoder(){ public POJO decode(String message) { return new POJO(message); } } .on(new Function() { .... }

Author:
Jeanfrancois Arcand
